thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: Simon M
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por Simon M

author: Simon M
title: Simon M
text:
Although we had to wait a short while for space in the courtesy bus who can complain when you have the warm Spanish sun on you back.
The staff are very efficient, from arrival at the offices to drive off was only about 8 minutes. The drop off was even quicker.
I'll definitely be using them again.
